title: Emiliana Simon-Thomas on Happiness
description: Psychologist Emiliana Simon-Thomas of the University of California, Berkeley talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about the science of happiness--what research can teach us about happiness.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
